name: Magus Lucea Kane
text:
Spiritual Leader — At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Psychic Stimulus — {T}: Add {C}{C}. When you next cast a spell with {X} in its mana cost or activate an ability with {X} in its activation cost this turn, copy that spell or ability. You may choose new targets for the copy. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

rulings.text: Spells with additional costs that include {X} won’t be affected by Magus Lucea Kane. {X} must be in the spell’s mana cost.
A spell or ability with a cost that includes X, but not the mana symbol {X}, won’t be copied.

Activated abilities contain a colon. They’re generally written “[Cost]: [Effect].” Some keyword abilities are activated abilities and will have a colon in their reminder text. Triggered abilities (starting with “when,” “whenever,” or “at”) that ask a player to pay {X} aren’t copied.
Magus Lucea Kane’s ability will copy any spell or activated ability whose mana cost or activation cost contains {X}, not just one with targets.

The {C}{C} created by the mana ability doesn’t need to be spent on the next spell or ability with {X} in its cost in order to copy it. That spell or ability will be copied even if that mana is spent on something else or not spent on anything at all.

A copy is created even if the spell or ability that caused the delayed triggered ability to trigger has been countered by the time that delayed triggered ability resolves. The copy resolves before the original spell.

The copy will have the same targets as the spell or ability it’s copying unless you choose new ones. You may change any number of the targets, including all of them or none of them. If the spell is a permanent spell with targets, such as an Aura, you may also choose a new target for that spell. The new targets must be legal. If, for any target, you can’t choose a new legal target, then it remains unchanged (even if the current target is illegal).
The copy is created on the stack, so it’s not “cast” or “activated.” Creating the copy won’t cause abilities that trigger when a player casts a spell or activates an ability to trigger.
The copy will resolve before the original spell or ability does.
If the spell or ability that’s copied is modal (that is, it says “Choose one —” or the like), the copy will have the same mode or modes. You can’t choose different ones.
The copy has the same value of X.

You can’t choose to pay any additional costs for a copied spell. However, effects based on any additional costs that were paid for the original spell are copied as though those same costs were paid for the copy too.

If the spell or ability has damage divided as it was put onto the stack, the division can’t be changed, although the targets receiving that damage still can. The same is true of spells and abilities that distribute counters.
Any choices made when the spell or ability resolves won’t have been made yet when it’s copied. Any such choices will be made separately when the copy resolves.

If a permanent spell is copied, it’s put onto the battlefield as a token as the spell resolves rather than putting the copy of the spell onto the battlefield. The rules that apply to a permanent spell becoming a permanent apply to a copy of a spell becoming a token.
The token that a resolving copy of a spell becomes isn’t said to have been “created.”

name: Space Marine Devastator
text:
Squad {2} (As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {2} any number of times. When this creature enters the battlefield, create that many tokens that are copies of it.)
Grav-cannon — When Space Marine Devastator enters the battlefield, destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment.

rulings.text: You may pay the squad cost any number of times. You will get a token that is a copy of that permanent for each time you paid the squad cost.
The ability will not trigger and tokens will not be created if the original spell has been countered or is otherwise no longer on the stack as the triggered ability resolves.
The tokens created by the squad ability aren’t “cast,” so any abilities that trigger when a spell is cast won’t trigger for the copies.
If, for some reason, the creature doesn’t have the squad ability when it’s on the battlefield, the ability won’t trigger, even if you’ve paid the squad cost one or more times.

name: Space Marine Scout
text:
First strike, vigilance
Concealed Position — When Space Marine Scout enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor: Through blood and battle, scouts are forged from raw recruits into the Imperium's finest.

rulings.text: Space Marine Scout’s triggered ability has an “intervening if clause,” which means that it checks to see whether or not an opponent controls more lands than you both when it triggers and when it resolves. If it isn’t true both times, you won’t search your library for a Plains card.

name: Triumph of Saint Katherine
text:
Lifelink
Praesidium Protectiva — When Triumph of Saint Katherine dies, exile it and the top six cards of your library in a face-down pile. If you do, shuffle that pile and put it back on top of your library.
Miracle {1}{W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

rulings.text: It’s important to reveal a card with miracle before it is mixed with the other cards in your hand.
You can reveal and cast a card with miracle on any turn, not just your own, if it’s the first card you’ve drawn that turn.

Multiple card draws are always treated as a sequence of individual card draws. For example, if you haven’t drawn any cards yet during a turn and cast a spell that instructs you to draw three cards, you’ll draw them one at a time. Only the first card drawn this way may be revealed and cast using its miracle ability.
If an effect puts a card into your hand without using the word “draw,” the card wasn’t drawn.
You don’t have to reveal a drawn card with miracle if you don’t wish to cast it at that time.

You can cast a card for its miracle cost only as the miracle triggered ability resolves. If you don’t want to cast it at that time (or you can’t cast it, perhaps because there are no legal targets available), you won’t be able to cast it later for the miracle cost.
You cast the card with miracle during the resolution of the triggered ability. Ignore any timing rules based on the card’s type.
Miracle is an alternative cost to cast the spell with miracle. It can’t be combined with other alternative costs, such as casting a spell “without paying its mana cost.”

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost (such as a miracle cost) you’re paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The mana value of the spell remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.
If the card with miracle leaves your hand before the triggered ability resolves, you won’t be able to cast it using its miracle ability.

You still draw the card, whether you use the miracle ability or not. Any ability that triggers whenever you draw a card, for example, will trigger. If you don’t cast the card using its miracle ability, it will remain in your hand.

foreignNames.name: Triumph der Heiligen Katherine
foreignNames.text:

name: Vexilus Praetor
text:
Flash
Vigilance
Aegis of the Emperor — Commanders you control have protection from everything.
flavor: There is no greater bulwark than the Praetors of the Adeptus Custodes, the bodyguards of the Emperor of Mankind.

rulings.text: Protection from everything means that commanders you control can’t be the target of any spells or abilities, they can’t be blocked, nothing can be attached to them, and all damage that would be dealt to them is prevented. They can still be affected in other ways (such as by Their Name is Death, for example).

name: Zephyrim
text:
Squad {2} (As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {2} any number of times. When this creature enters the battlefield, create that many tokens that are copies of it.)
Flying, vigilance
Miracle {1}{W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

rulings.text: If you cast Zephyrim for its miracle cost, you may also choose to pay its squad cost one or more times.
See also “New Keyword Ability: Squad” and “Returning Keyword Ability: Miracle” in the General Notes section.
You may pay the squad cost any number of times. You will get a token that is a copy of that permanent for each time you paid the squad cost.
The ability will not trigger and tokens will not be created if the original spell has been countered or is otherwise no longer on the stack as the triggered ability resolves.
The tokens created by the squad ability aren’t “cast,” so any abilities that trigger when a spell is cast won’t trigger for the copies.
If, for some reason, the creature doesn’t have the squad ability when it’s on the battlefield, the ability won’t trigger, even if you’ve paid the squad cost one or more times.
It’s important to reveal a card with miracle before it is mixed with the other cards in your hand.
You can reveal and cast a card with miracle on any turn, not just your own, if it’s the first card you’ve drawn that turn.

Multiple card draws are always treated as a sequence of individual card draws. For example, if you haven’t drawn any cards yet during a turn and cast a spell that instructs you to draw three cards, you’ll draw them one at a time. Only the first card drawn this way may be revealed and cast using its miracle ability.
If an effect puts a card into your hand without using the word “draw,” the card wasn’t drawn.
You don’t have to reveal a drawn card with miracle if you don’t wish to cast it at that time.

You can cast a card for its miracle cost only as the miracle triggered ability resolves. If you don’t want to cast it at that time (or you can’t cast it, perhaps because there are no legal targets available), you won’t be able to cast it later for the miracle cost.
You cast the card with miracle during the resolution of the triggered ability. Ignore any timing rules based on the card’s type.
Miracle is an alternative cost to cast the spell with miracle. It can’t be combined with other alternative costs, such as casting a spell “without paying its mana cost.”

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost (such as a miracle cost) you’re paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The mana value of the spell remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.
If the card with miracle leaves your hand before the triggered ability resolves, you won’t be able to cast it using its miracle ability.

You still draw the card, whether you use the miracle ability or not. Any ability that triggers whenever you draw a card, for example, will trigger. If you don’t cast the card using its miracle ability, it will remain in your hand.

name: Genestealer Patriarch
text:
Genestealer's Kiss — Whenever Genestealer Patriarch attacks, put an infection counter on target creature defending player controls.
Children of the Cult — Whenever a creature with an infection counter on it dies, you create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's a Tyranid in addition to its other types.

rulings.text: The token copies the creature as it last existed on the battlefield before it died, not as it exists in the graveyard.
If you control more than one Genestealer Patriarch as a creature with an infection counter on it dies, each one’s ability will trigger, and you will make two tokens that are copies of it.

The token copies exactly what was printed on the original creature and nothing else (unless that creature is copying something else; see below). It doesn’t copy whether that creature was tapped or untapped, whether it had any counters on it or Auras or Equipment attached to it, or any non-copy effects that had changed its power, toughness, types, color, or so on.
If the copied creature was copying something else, then the token enters the battlefield as whatever that creature copied.
If the copied creature had {X} in its mana cost, X is 0.

Any enters-the-battlefield abilities of the copied creature will trigger when the token enters the battlefield. Any “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” or “[this creature] enters the battlefield with” abilities of the creature will also work.

Kinder des Kults — Immer wenn eine Kreatur mit Infektionsmarke stirbt, erzeuge einen Spielstein, der eine Kopie der Kreatur ist, außer dass er zusätzlich zu seinen anderen Typen ein Tyranide ist.

Hijos del Culto — Siempre que una criatura con un contador de infección sobre ella muera, creas una ficha que es una copia de esa criatura, excepto que es un Tiránido además de sus otros tipos.

name: Heralds of Tzeentch
text:
Flying
Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

rulings.text: A spell’s mana value is determined only by its mana cost. Ignore any alternative costs, additional costs, cost increases, or cost reductions.
Cascade triggers when you cast the spell, meaning that it resolves before that spell. If you end up casting the exiled card, it will go on the stack above the spell with cascade.
When the cascade ability resolves, you must exile cards. The only optional part of the ability is whether or not you cast the last card exiled.
If a spell with cascade is countered, the cascade ability will still resolve normally.
You exile the cards face up. All players will be able to see them.

If you cast a card “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t choose to cast it for any alternative costs. You can, however, pay additional costs. If the card has any mandatory additional costs, you must pay those to cast the card.
If the card has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as the value of X when casting it without paying its mana cost.

Due to a 2021 rules change to cascade, not only do you stop exiling cards if you exile a nonland card with lesser mana value than the spell with cascade, but the resulting spell you cast must also have lesser mana value. Previously, in cases where a card’s mana value differed from the resulting spell, such as with some modal double-faced cards or cards with an Adventure, you could cast a spell with a higher mana value than the exiled card.

Two new cards in this set give the next spell you cast cascade. This means that the next spell you cast gains cascade as you begin to cast it by putting it on the stack, and the cascade ability will trigger when you finish casting that spell.

foreignNames.name: Herolde des Tzeentch
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Kaskade (Wenn du diesen Zauberspruch wirkst, schicke Karten oben von deiner Bibliothek ins Exil, bis du eine Nichtland-Karte ins Exil schickst, die weniger kostet. Du kannst sie wirken, ohne ihre Manakosten zu bezahlen. Lege die so ins Exil geschickten Karten in zufälliger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek.)

name: Heralds of Tzeentch
text:
Flying
Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

rulings.text: A spell’s mana value is determined only by its mana cost. Ignore any alternative costs, additional costs, cost increases, or cost reductions.
Cascade triggers when you cast the spell, meaning that it resolves before that spell. If you end up casting the exiled card, it will go on the stack above the spell with cascade.
When the cascade ability resolves, you must exile cards. The only optional part of the ability is whether or not you cast the last card exiled.
If a spell with cascade is countered, the cascade ability will still resolve normally.
You exile the cards face up. All players will be able to see them.

If you cast a card “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t choose to cast it for any alternative costs. You can, however, pay additional costs. If the card has any mandatory additional costs, you must pay those to cast the card.
If the card has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as the value of X when casting it without paying its mana cost.

Due to a 2021 rules change to cascade, not only do you stop exiling cards if you exile a nonland card with lesser mana value than the spell with cascade, but the resulting spell you cast must also have lesser mana value. Previously, in cases where a card’s mana value differed from the resulting spell, such as with some modal double-faced cards or cards with an Adventure, you could cast a spell with a higher mana value than the exiled card.

Two new cards in this set give the next spell you cast cascade. This means that the next spell you cast gains cascade as you begin to cast it by putting it on the stack, and the cascade ability will trigger when you finish casting that spell.

rulings.text: You may pay the squad cost any number of times. You will get a token that is a copy of that permanent for each time you paid the squad cost.

flavor: "Though it may take an eternity, I will see the myriad dynasties united once more."

rulings.text: You may only cast a spell this way by paying the appropriate amount of life. You may not pay its normal cost and may not pay any other alternative costs. You may still pay for additional costs, such as kicker costs. If the spell has mandatory additional costs, you must pay those.
If you cast a spell with {X} in its mana cost this way, the only legal choice for X is 0.

foreignNames.name: Anrakyr der Reisende
foreignNames.text: Herr der pyrrhianischen Legionen — Immer wenn Anrakyr der Reisende angreift, kannst du einen Artefaktzauber aus deiner Hand oder deinem Friedhof wirken, indem du Lebenspunkte in Höhe seines Manabetrags bezahlst, anstatt seine Manakosten zu bezahlen.
foreignNames.flavor: „Auch wenn es eine Ewigkeit dauert, ich werde die unzähligen Dynastien wieder vereint sehen."

foreignNames.name: Anrakyr, el Viajero
foreignNames.text: Señor de las Legiones Pyrrhianas — Siempre que Anrakyr, el Viajero ataque, puedes lanzar un hechizo de artefacto desde tu mano o cementerio pagando una cantidad de vidas igual a su valor de mana en lugar de pagar su coste de maná.
foreignNames.flavor: "Aunque tarde una eternidad, veré a las innumerables dinastías unidas de nuevo".

foreignNames.name: Anrakyr le Voyageur
foreignNames.text: Seigneur des Légions de Pyrrhia — À chaque fois qu'Anrakyr le Voyageur attaque, vous pouvez lancer un sort d'artefact depuis votre main ou votre cimetière en payant un nombre de points de vie égal à sa valeur de mana à la place de payer son coût de mana.
foreignNames.flavor: « Même si cela prend une éternité, je verrai toutes les dynasties réunies une fois de plus. »

foreignNames.flavor: "Anche se potrebbe volerci un'eternità, vedrò le miriadi di dinastie unite ancora una volta."

name: Arco-Flagellant
text:
Squad {2} (As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {2} any number of times. When this creature enters the battlefield, create that many tokens that are copies of it.)
Arco-Flagellant can't block.
Endurant — Pay 3 life: Arco-Flagellant gains indestructible until end of turn.

rulings.text: You may pay the squad cost any number of times. You will get a token that is a copy of that permanent for each time you paid the squad cost.
The ability will not trigger and tokens will not be created if the original spell has been countered or is otherwise no longer on the stack as the triggered ability resolves.
The tokens created by the squad ability aren’t “cast,” so any abilities that trigger when a spell is cast won’t trigger for the copies.
If, for some reason, the creature doesn’t have the squad ability when it’s on the battlefield, the ability won’t trigger, even if you’ve paid the squad cost one or more times.

name: Biotransference
text:
Creatures you control are artifacts in addition to their other types. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.
Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you lose 1 life and create a 2/2 black Necron Warrior artifact creature token.

rulings.text: Replacement effects that modify artifacts as they enter the battlefield will apply after you apply Biotransference’s effect. For example, if you control a Biotransference and there is an effect that says artifacts enter the battlefield tapped, creatures you control will enter the battlefield tapped.

foreignNames.name: Biotransfer
foreignNames.text:
Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, sind zusätzlich zu ihren anderen Typen Artefakte. Dasselbe gilt für Kreaturenzauber, die du kontrollierst, und Kreaturenkarten, die du besitzt und die nicht im Spiel sind.
Immer wenn du einen Artefaktzauber wirkst, verlierst du 1 Lebenspunkt und erzeugst einen 2/2 schwarzen Necron-Krieger-Artefaktkreaturenspielstein.

foreignNames.name: Biotransferencia

Las criaturas que controlas son artefactos además de sus otros tipos. Lo mismo sucede con los hechizos de criatura que controlas y con las cartas de criatura de las que eres propietario que no están en el campo de batalla.
Siempre que lances un hechizo de artefacto, pierdes 1 vida y creas una ficha de criatura artefacto Guerrero Necrón negra 2/2.

foreignNames.name: Biotransfert
foreignNames.text:
Les créatures que vous contrôlez sont des artefacts en plus de leurs autres types. C'est vrai aussi pour les sorts de créature que vous contrôlez et les cartes de créature que vous possédez qui ne sont pas sur le champ de bataille.
À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort d'artefact, vous perdez 1 point de vie et vous créez un jeton de créature-artefact 2/2 noire Nécron et Guerrier.

foreignNames.name: Biotrasferimento

Le creature che controlli sono artefatti in aggiunta ai loro altri tipi. Lo stesso vale per le magie creatura che controlli e le carte creatura che possiedi e che non sono sul campo di battaglia.
Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia artefatto, perdi 1 punto vita e crei una pedina creatura artefatto Guerriero Necron 2/2 nera.

foreignNames.name: 生体転移
foreignNames.text:

あなたがアーティファクト・呪文を唱えるたび、あなたは１点のライフを失い、黒の２/２のネクロン・戦士・アーティファクト・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。

foreignNames.name: Biotransferência
foreignNames.text:
As criaturas que você controla são artefatos além de seus outros tipos. O mesmo vale para mágicas de criatura que você controla e cards de criatura seus que não estejam no campo de batalha.
Toda vez que você conjura uma mágica de artefato, você perde 1 ponto de vida e cria uma ficha de criatura artefato Necron Guerreiro preta 2/2.

每当你施放神器咒语时，你失去1点生命并派出一个2/2黑色太空死灵／战士衍生神器生物。

name: Blight Grenade
text:
Destroy target creature.
All creatures get -3/-3 until end of turn.

foreignNames.name: Seuchengranate
foreignNames.text:
Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl.
Alle Kreaturen erhalten -3/-3 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor: Seuchengranaten — die verheerenden Schaden an ihren Opfern anrichten — haben keine Auswirkungen auf die Death Guard, die sie gerne im Nahkampf gegen ihre Feinde einsetzen.

foreignNames.name: Granada de plaga
foreignNames.text:
Destruye la criatura objetivo.
Todas las criaturas obtienen -3/-3 hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Las granadas de plaga, que provocan efectos horripilantes a sus víctimas, no afectan a la Guardia de la Muerte, que no duda en usarlas a muy poca distancia de sus enemigos.

foreignNames.name: Grenade bubonique
foreignNames.text:
Détruisez une créature ciblée.
Toutes les créatures gagnent -3/-3 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor: Les grenades buboniques (qui ont des effets horribles sur leurs victimes) n'ont aucun impact sur la Death Guard, qui utilise sans hésiter les appareils en contact extrêmement rapproché avec l'ennemi.

foreignNames.name: Granata del Contagio
foreignNames.text:
Distruggi una creatura bersaglio.
Tutte le creature prendono -3/-3 fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Le granate del contagio inducono effetti orribili sulle loro vittime, ma non hanno alcun impatto sulla Death Guard, che le usa senza remore nei combattimenti a distanza ravvicinata con il nemico.

foreignNames.name: ブライトグレネード
foreignNames.text:
クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それを破壊する。
ターン終了時まで、すべてのクリーチャーは－３/－３の修整を受ける。
foreignNames.flavor: 被害者におぞましい症状を引き起こすブライトグレネードはデスガードに何の効果もないため、至近距離で敵に投擲することをためらわない。

foreignNames.name: Granada de Praga
foreignNames.text:
Destrua a criatura alvo.
Todas as criaturas recebem -3/-3 até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor: As granadas de praga, que causam efeitos horrendos nas vítimas, não têm nenhum impacto na Guarda da Morte, que as usa tranquilamente no copo a corpo com o inimigo.

foreignNames.name: 枯萎手雷
foreignNames.text:
消灭目标生物。
所有生物得-3/-3直到回合结束。
foreignNames.flavor: 枯萎手雷爆炸后会对范围内人员造成恐怖损害，而死亡守卫却能毫发无伤～因而他们在与敌人近距肉搏时也乐于使用这种武器。

name: Chronomancer
text:
Flying
Atomic Transmutation — {1}, {T}, Sacrifice another artifact: Draw a card.
Unearth {2}{B} ({2}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

rulings.text: If you activate a card’s unearth ability but that card is removed from your graveyard before the ability resolves, that unearth ability will resolve and do nothing.

Activating a permanent card's unearth ability isn’t the same as casting it as a spell. The unearth ability is put on the stack, but the card is not. Spells and abilities that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle) will interact with unearth, but spells and abilities that interact with spells (such as Cancel) will not.

If a permanent returned to the battlefield by an unearth ability would leave it for any reason, it’s exiled instead—unless the spell or ability that's causing it to leave the battlefield is actually trying to exile it. In that case, the spell or ability succeeds at exiling the permanent. If the spell or ability later returns the card to the battlefield, it will return as a new object with no relation to its previous existence. The unearth effect will no longer apply to it.

At the beginning of the end step, a permanent returned to the battlefield with unearth is exiled. This is a delayed triggered ability, and it can be countered by effects that counter triggered abilities. If the ability is countered, the permanent will stay on the battlefield and the delayed trigger won’t trigger again. However, the replacement effect will still exile it if it eventually leaves the battlefield.

Unearth grants haste to the permanent that’s returned to the battlefield. However, neither of the “exile” abilities is granted to that permanent. If that creature loses all its abilities, it will still be exiled at the beginning of the end step, and if it would leave the battlefield, it is still exiled instead.

foreignNames.name: Chronomant
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Atomare Transmutation — {1}, {T}, opfere ein anderes Artefakt: Ziehe eine Karte.
Exhumieren {2}{B} ({2}{B}: Bringe diese Karte aus deinem Friedhof ins Spiel zurück. Sie erhält Eile. Schicke sie zu Beginn des nächsten Endsegments, oder falls sie das Spiel verlassen würde, ins Exil. Spiele Exhumieren wie eine Hexerei.)

foreignNames.name: Cronomante
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Transmutación atómica — {1}, {T}, sacrificar otro artefacto: Roba una carta.
Desenterrar {2}{B}. ({2}{B}: Regresa esta carta de tu cementerio al campo de batalla. Gana la habilidad de prisa. Exíliala al comienzo del próximo paso final o si fuera a dejar el campo de batalla. Activa la habilidad de desenterrar solo como un conjuro.)

foreignNames.name: Chronomancien
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Transmutation atomique — {1}, {T}, sacrifiez un autre artefact : Piochez une carte.
Exhumation {2}{B} ({2}{B} : Renvoyez cette carte sur le champ de bataille depuis votre cimetière. Elle acquiert la célérité. Exilez-la au début de la prochaine étape de fin ou si elle devait quitter le champ de bataille. N'exhumez que lorsque vous pourriez lancer un rituel.)

foreignNames.name: Chronomancer
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Trasmutazione Atomica — {1}, {T}, Sacrifica un altro artefatto: Pesca una carta.
Dissotterrare {2}{B} ({2}{B}: Rimetti sul campo di battaglia questa carta dal tuo cimitero. Ha rapidità. Esiliala all'inizio della prossima sottofase finale o se sta per lasciare il campo di battaglia. Dissotterra solo come una stregoneria.)

foreignNames.text:
飛行
原子変成術 — {1},{T},これでないアーティファクト１つを生け贄に捧げる：カード１枚を引く。

name: Cryptek
text: {1}{B}, {T}: Choose another target artifact creature you control. When that creature dies this turn, return it to the battlefield tapped under your control.
flavor: There are those who draw false comparisons between the tech-magi of the Adeptus Mechanicus and the xenotechnologists of the necron race. There can be no mercy for such heretics.

rulings.text: All Cryptek’s activated ability does when it resolves is set up a delayed triggered ability. If the target artifact creature isn’t put into a graveyard this turn, that ability never triggers. If the targeted artifact creature is put into a graveyard this turn, that ability triggers and resolves like any other triggered ability.

foreignNames.name: Kryptomant
foreignNames.text: {1}{B}, {T}: Bestimme eine andere Artefaktkreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst. Wenn die Kreatur in diesem Zug stirbt, bringe sie getappt unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: Manche stellen falsche Vergleiche zwischen den Tech-Magi des Adeptus Mechanicus und den Xenotechnikern der Necrons an. Für solche Ketzer kann es keine Gnade geben.

foreignNames.name: Criptecnólogo
foreignNames.text: {1}{B}, {T}: Elige otra criatura artefacto objetivo que controlas. Cuando esa criatura muera este turno, regrésala al campo de batalla girada bajo tu control.
foreignNames.flavor: Hay quienes hacen comparaciones falsas entre los tecnomagos del Adeptus Mechanicus y los xenotecnólogos de la raza necrona. Ante tamaña herejía no se puede mostrar piedad alguna.

foreignNames.name: Cryptek
foreignNames.text: {1}{B}, {T} : Choisissez une autre créature-artefact ciblée que vous contrôlez. Quand cette créature meurt ce tour-ci, renvoyez-la sur le champ de bataille, engagée et sous votre contrôle.
foreignNames.flavor: Il y en a qui tirent des fausses comparaisons entre les techno-mages des Adeptus Mechanicus et les xénotechnologues des Nécrons. Il ne peut y avoir aucune pitié pour de tels hérétiques.

foreignNames.name: Cryptek
foreignNames.text: {1}{B}, {T}: Scegli un'altra creatura artefatto bersaglio che controlli. Quando quella creatura muore in questo turno, rimettila sul campo di battaglia TAPpata sotto il tuo controllo.
foreignNames.flavor: C'è chi traccia falsi paragoni fra i tecnomagi dell'Adeptus Mechanicus e gli xenotecnologi della razza Necron. Non può esserci pietà per simili eretici.

foreignNames.name: クリプテック

foreignNames.flavor: 帝国技術局の技術賢人とネクロン族の異星技術者を誤って比較する者がいる。そのような異端者には情けは無用である。

foreignNames.name: Cripteca

foreignNames.flavor: Há quem trace falsos paralelos entre os tecnomagos do Adeptus Mechanicus e os xenotecnólogos da raça dos necrons. Não pode haver misericórdia com tais hereges.

name: Hexmark Destroyer
text:
Multi-threat Eliminator — Hexmark Destroyer can't be blocked except by six or more creatures.
Unearth {4}{B}{B} ({4}{B}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

rulings.text: If you activate a card’s unearth ability but that card is removed from your graveyard before the ability resolves, that unearth ability will resolve and do nothing.

Activating a permanent card's unearth ability isn’t the same as casting it as a spell. The unearth ability is put on the stack, but the card is not. Spells and abilities that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle) will interact with unearth, but spells and abilities that interact with spells (such as Cancel) will not.

If a permanent returned to the battlefield by an unearth ability would leave it for any reason, it’s exiled instead—unless the spell or ability that's causing it to leave the battlefield is actually trying to exile it. In that case, the spell or ability succeeds at exiling the permanent. If the spell or ability later returns the card to the battlefield, it will return as a new object with no relation to its previous existence. The unearth effect will no longer apply to it.

At the beginning of the end step, a permanent returned to the battlefield with unearth is exiled. This is a delayed triggered ability, and it can be countered by effects that counter triggered abilities. If the ability is countered, the permanent will stay on the battlefield and the delayed trigger won’t trigger again. However, the replacement effect will still exile it if it eventually leaves the battlefield.

Unearth grants haste to the permanent that’s returned to the battlefield. However, neither of the “exile” abilities is granted to that permanent. If that creature loses all its abilities, it will still be exiled at the beginning of the end step, and if it would leave the battlefield, it is still exiled instead.

rulings.text: When its triggered ability resolves, you may sacrifice Lokhust Heavy Destroyer itself. If you control no other creatures, you'll have to sacrifice it. If it was unearthed, it will be exiled.

foreignNames.text: Bestimme eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst. Zerstöre jede Kreatur, deren Stärke kleiner ist als die Stärke der bestimmten Kreatur.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Ich bin der Erzfeind, der Vernichter von Welten, und durch meine Hand wird der falsche Imperator fallen."
—Abaddon der Vernichter

foreignNames.name: Mandato de Abaddon
foreignNames.text: Elige la criatura objetivo que controlas. Destruye todas las criaturas con fuerza menor que la fuerza de esa criatura.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Yo soy el Archidemonio, el Saqueador de Mundos, y mis manos serán las que hagan caer al falso Emperador".
—Abaddon, el Saqueador

foreignNames.name: Mandat d'Abaddon
foreignNames.text: Choisissez une créature ciblée que vous contrôlez. Détruisez toutes les créatures de force inférieure à la force de cette créature.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Je suis l'Archi-Ennemi, le Destructeur de Mondes. C'est par ma main que le Faux Empereur sera déchu. »
—Abaddon le Fléau

foreignNames.name: Mandato di Abaddon
foreignNames.text: Scegli una creatura bersaglio che controlli. Distruggi tutte le creature con forza inferiore alla forza di quella creatura.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Io sono l'arcidemone, il distruttore di mondi, e per mano mia cadrà il falso Imperatore."
—Abaddon il Distruttore

foreignNames.name: アバドンの執行
foreignNames.text: あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー１体を対象とする。パワーがそのクリーチャーより小さいすべてのクリーチャーを破壊する。
foreignNames.flavor:
「我こそがアーチフィーンド、世界の強奪者である。偽りの皇帝は我が手によって墜ちるのだ。」
――強奪者、アバドン

foreignNames.name: Ordens de Abaddon
foreignNames.text: Escolha a criatura alvo que você controla. Destrua todas as criaturas com poder inferior ao poder daquela criatura.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Eu sou o Arquidemônio, o Despojador de Mundos, e pelas minhas mãos cairá o falso Imperador."
— Abaddon, o Despojador

foreignNames.name: 阿巴顿的敕令
foreignNames.text: 选择目标由你操控的生物。消灭所有力量小于前者的生物。
foreignNames.flavor:
「吾乃至高恶魔，吾是诸界之掠夺者，吾定将亲手摧毁伪帝统治。」
～掠夺者阿巴顿

originalText: Choose target creature you control. Destroy all creatures with power less than that creature's power.

name: Mandate of Abaddon
text: Choose target creature you control. Destroy all creatures with power less than that creature's power.
flavor:
"I am the Arch-fiend, the Despoiler of Worlds, and by my hands shall the false Emperor fall."
—Abaddon the Despoiler

rulings.text: If the chosen creature is an illegal target as Mandate of Abaddon tries to resolve, it will be removed from the stack and no creatures will be destroyed.

name: Mortarion, Daemon Primarch
text:
Flying
Primarch of the Death Guard — At the beginning of your end step, you may pay {X}. If you do, create X 2/2 black Astartes Warrior creature tokens with menace. X can't be greater than the amount of life you lost this turn.

rulings.text: Mortarion, Demon Primarch’s ability looks only at the amount of life you’ve lost this turn, regardless of any life you may have gained. For example, if you lost 3 life due to combat damage, but gained 2 life later in the turn, X may be up to 3 for this ability.

If a spell or ability sets a player’s life total to a specified amount, that player gains or loses the appropriate amount of life. For example, if your life total is 20 and an effect sets your life total to 15, you lost 5 life.

foreignNames.name: Mortarion, Dämonenprimarch
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Primarch der Death Guard — Zu Beginn deines Endsegments kannst du {X} bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, erzeuge X 2/2 schwarze Astartes-Krieger-Kreaturenspielsteine mit Bedrohlichkeit. X kann nicht größer sein als die Anzahl an Lebenspunkten, die du in diesem Zug verloren hast.

foreignNames.name: Mortarion, Primarca daemon
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Primarca de la Guardia de la Muerte — Al comienzo de tu paso final, puedes pagar {X}. Si lo haces, crea X fichas de criatura Guerrero Astartes negras 2/2 con la habilidad de amenaza. X no puede ser mayor que la cantidad de vidas que perdiste este turno.

foreignNames.name: Mortarion, Primarque démon
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Primarque de la Death Guard — Au début de votre étape de fin, vous pouvez payer {X}. Si vous faites ainsi, créez X jetons de créature 2/2 noire Astartes et Guerrier avec la menace. X ne peut pas être supérieur au nombre de points de vie que vous avez perdus ce tour-ci.

foreignNames.name: Mortarion, Primarca Demoniaco
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Primarca della Death Guard — All'inizio della tua sottofase finale, puoi pagare {X}. Se lo fai, crea X pedine creatura Guerriero Astartes 2/2 nere con minacciare. X non può essere maggiore dei punti vita che hai perso in questo turno.

foreignNames.name: 総魔長、モータリオン
foreignNames.text:
飛行
デスガードの総主長 — あなたの終了ステップの開始時に、あなたは{X}を支払ってもよい。そうしたなら、威迫を持つ黒の２/２のアスタルテス・戦士・クリーチャー・トークンＸ体を生成する。Ｘはこのターンにあなたが失ったライフの点数以下でなければならない。
foreignNames.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — デーモン・総主長

foreignNames.name: Mortarion, Primarca Daemônio
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Primarca da Guarda da Morte — No início de sua etapa final, você pode pagar {X}. Se fizer isso, crie X fichas de criatura Astartes Guerreiro preta 2/2 com ameaçar. X não pode ser maior que a quantidade de pontos de vida que você perdeu neste turno.

foreignNames.name: 恶魔原体莫塔里安
foreignNames.text:
飞行
死亡守卫原体～在你的结束步骤开始时，你可以支付{X}。若你如此作，则派出X个2/2黑色，具威慑异能的阿斯塔特／战士衍生生物。X不能大于你本回合中失去过的生命数量。

originalText:
Flying
Primarch of the Death Guard — At the beginning of your end step, you may pay {X}. If you do, create X 2/2 black Astartes Warrior creature tokens with menace. X can't be greater than the amount of life you lost this turn.

name: Mortarion, Daemon Primarch
text:
Flying
Primarch of the Death Guard — At the beginning of your end step, you may pay {X}. If you do, create X 2/2 black Astartes Warrior creature tokens with menace. X can't be greater than the amount of life you lost this turn.

rulings.text: Mortarion, Demon Primarch’s ability looks only at the amount of life you’ve lost this turn, regardless of any life you may have gained. For example, if you lost 3 life due to combat damage, but gained 2 life later in the turn, X may be up to 3 for this ability.

If a spell or ability sets a player’s life total to a specified amount, that player gains or loses the appropriate amount of life. For example, if your life total is 20 and an effect sets your life total to 15, you lost 5 life.

name: Necron Deathmark
text:
Flash
Synaptic Disintegrator — When Necron Deathmark enters the battlefield, destroy up to one target creature and target player mills three cards.

foreignNames.name: Necron-Neurojäger
foreignNames.text:
Aufblitzen
Synapsen-Desintegrator — Wenn der Necron-Neurojäger ins Spiel kommt, zerstöre bis zu eine Kreatur deiner Wahl und ein Spieler deiner Wahl millt drei Karten.

foreignNames.name: Omnicida Necrón
foreignNames.text:
Destello.
Desintegrador sináptico — Cuando el Omnicida Necrón entre al campo de batalla, destruye hasta una criatura objetivo y el jugador objetivo muele tres cartas.

foreignNames.name: Traqueur nécron
foreignNames.text:
Flash
Désintégrateur synaptique — Quand le Traqueur nécron arrive sur le champ de bataille, détruisez jusqu'à une créature ciblée et un joueur ciblé meule trois cartes.

foreignNames.name: Necrocecchino Necron
foreignNames.text:
Lampo
Disintegratore Sinaptico — Quando il Necrocecchino Necron entra nel campo di battaglia, distruggi fino a una creatura bersaglio e un giocatore bersaglio macina tre carte.

foreignNames.name: ネクロン・デスマーク
foreignNames.text:
瞬速
シナプティック・ディスインテグレイター — ネクロン・デスマークが戦場に出たとき、クリーチャー最大１体とプレイヤー１人を対象とする。その前者を破壊し、その後者はカード３枚を切削する。
foreignNames.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — ネクロン

foreignNames.name: Necroatirador Necron
foreignNames.text:
Lampejo
Desintegrador Sináptico — Quando Necroatirador Necron entrar no campo de batalha, destrua até uma criatura alvo e o jogador alvo tritura três cards.

foreignNames.name: 太空死灵死印战士
foreignNames.text:
闪现
突触粉碎枪～当太空死灵死印战士进战场时，消灭至多一个目标生物且目标牌手磨三张牌。

originalText:
Flash
Synaptic Disintegrator — When Necron Deathmark enters the battlefield, destroy up to one target creature and target player mills three cards.

name: Necron Deathmark
text:
Flash
Synaptic Disintegrator — When Necron Deathmark enters the battlefield, destroy up to one target creature and target player mills three cards.

name: Necron Overlord
text: Relentless March — {X}, {T}, Tap X untapped artifacts you control: Target opponent loses X life.
flavor: "This galaxy once knelt before us, and it will do so again."

foreignNames.name: Necron-Hochlord
foreignNames.text: Unerbittlicher Marsch — {X}, {T}, tappe X ungetappte Artefakte, die du kontrollierst: Ein Gegner deiner Wahl verliert X Lebenspunkte.
foreignNames.flavor: „Diese Galaxie beugte einst das Knie vor uns und sie wird es wieder tun."

foreignNames.name: Señor Supremo Necrón
foreignNames.text: Marcha implacable — {X}, {T}, girar X artefactos enderezados que controlas: El oponente objetivo pierde X vidas.
foreignNames.flavor: "Antaño, toda esta galaxia se arrodillaba ante nosotros, y lo volverá a hacer".

foreignNames.name: Tétrarque nécron
foreignNames.text: Progression implacable — {X}, {T}, engagez X artefacts dégagés que vous contrôlez : Un adversaire ciblé perd X points de vie.
foreignNames.flavor: « Jadis, cette galaxie s'est agenouillée devant nous, et elle recommencera. »

foreignNames.name: Signore Supremo Necron
foreignNames.text: Marcia Inesorabile — {X}, {T}, TAPpa X artefatti STAPpati che controlli: Un avversario bersaglio perde X punti vita.
foreignNames.flavor: "Questa galassia si è inginocchiata davanti a noi in passato e lo farà di nuovo."

foreignNames.name: ネクロン・オーヴァーロード
foreignNames.text: 無慈悲な行進 — {X},{T},あなたがコントロールしているアンタップ状態のアーティファクトＸ個をタップする：対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはＸ点のライフを失う。
foreignNames.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — ネクロン・貴族
foreignNames.flavor: 「この銀河系はかつて我々の元に跪いていた。そしていずれまたそうすることになる。」

foreignNames.name: Soberano Necron
foreignNames.text: Marcha Implacável — {X}, {T}, vire X artefatos desvirados que você controla: O oponente alvo perde X pontos de vida.
foreignNames.flavor: "Esta galáxia já se ajoelhou perante nós, e ela o fará novamente."

foreignNames.name: 太空死灵霸主
foreignNames.text: 无情行军～{X}，{T}，横置X个由你操控且未横置的神器：目标对手失去X点生命。
foreignNames.type: 神器生物 ～太空死灵／贵族
foreignNames.flavor: 「这片银河曾经臣服于我们，历史必将重演。」

originalText: Relentless March — {X}, {T}, Tap X untapped artifacts you control: Target opponent loses X life.

name: Necron Overlord
text: Relentless March — {X}, {T}, Tap X untapped artifacts you control: Target opponent loses X life.
flavor: "This galaxy once knelt before us, and it will do so again."

name: Nurgle's Conscription
text: Put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield tapped under your control, then exile that player's graveyard.
flavor:
"In the embrace of the great Nurgle, I am no longer afraid, for with His pestilential favour I have become that which I once most feared: Death."
—Kulvain Hestarius of the Death Guard

foreignNames.name: Nurgles Zwang
foreignNames.text: Bringe eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus dem Friedhof eines Gegners getappt unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel und schicke dann den Friedhof jenes Spielers ins Exil.
foreignNames.flavor:
„In der Umarmung des großen Nurgle verspüre ich keine Angst mehr, denn mit seiner pestilenten Gunst wurde ich das, was ich einst am meisten fürchtete: der Tod."
—Kulvain Hestarius von der Death Guard

foreignNames.name: Reclutamiento de Nurgle
foreignNames.text: Pon en el campo de batalla girada bajo tu control la carta de criatura objetivo del cementerio de un oponente y luego exilia el cementerio de ese jugador.
foreignNames.flavor:
"En el abrazo del gran Nurgle no tengo miedo, porque con Su pestilente favor me he convertido en lo que antaño temía: Muerte".
—Kulvain Hestarius, de la Guardia de la Muerte

foreignNames.name: Conscription de Nurgle
foreignNames.text: Mettez sur le champ de bataille, engagée et sous votre contrôle, une carte de créature ciblée depuis le cimetière d'un adversaire, puis exilez le cimetière de ce joueur.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Dans l'étreinte du grand Nurgle, je n'ai plus peur, car avec Sa faveur pestilentielle, je suis devenu ce que je craignais autrefois : la Mort. »
—Kulvain Hestarius de la Death Guard

foreignNames.name: Reclutamento di Nurgle
foreignNames.text: Metti sul campo di battaglia TAPpata sotto il tuo controllo una carta creatura bersaglio dal cimitero di un avversario, poi esilia il cimitero di quel giocatore.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Nell'abbraccio del grande Nurgle, non ho più paura, perché con il suo favore pestilenziale sono diventato ciò che una volta temevo di più: la morte."
—Kulvain Hestarius della Death Guard

foreignNames.name: ナーグルの徴兵
foreignNames.text: 対戦相手の墓地にあるクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とする。それをあなたのコントロール下でタップ状態で戦場に出す。その後、そのプレイヤーの墓地を追放する。
foreignNames.flavor:
「偉大なるナーグルの腕の中で、私はもはや恐れ知らずだ。何故なら主の伝染する恵みによって私が最も恐れていたもの、すなわち『死』そのものに生まれ変わったのだから。」
――デスガードのクルヴェイン・ヘスタリウス

foreignNames.name: Conscrição de Nurgle
foreignNames.text: Coloque o card de criatura alvo do cemitério de um oponente no campo de batalha virado sob seu controle e depois exile o cemitério daquele jogador.
foreignNames.flavor:
"No abraço do grande Nurgle, não tenho mais medo, pois com Sua pestilenta bênção me tornei o que eu mais temia: a Morte."
— Kulvain Hestarius da Guarda da Morte

foreignNames.name: 纳垢征召
foreignNames.text: 将目标生物牌在你操控下从对手坟墓场横置放进战场，然后放逐该牌手的坟墓场。
foreignNames.flavor:
「得受纳垢之拥，我从此不再害怕；如今我已蒙获其疫病加持，转变为我曾最惧怕之物：死亡。」
～死亡守卫的寇维恩·赫斯塔流斯

originalText: Put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield tapped under your control, then exile that player's graveyard.

name: Nurgle's Conscription
text: Put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield tapped under your control, then exile that player's graveyard.
flavor:
"In the embrace of the great Nurgle, I am no longer afraid, for with His pestilential favour I have become that which I once most feared: Death."
—Kulvain Hestarius of the Death Guard

name: Nurgle's Rot
text:
Enchant creature an opponent controls
When enchanted creature dies, return Nurgle's Rot to its owner's hand and you create a 1/3 black Demon creature token named Plaguebearer of Nurgle.
flavor: Each plaguebearer is formed from the blighted soul of a mortal slain by Nurgle's Rot.

foreignNames.name: Fäulnis des Nurgle
foreignNames.text:
Verzaubert eine Kreatur, die ein Gegner kontrolliert.
Wenn die verzauberte Kreatur stirbt, bringe die Fäulnis des Nurgle auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück und du erzeugst einen 1/3 schwarzen Dämon-Kreaturenspielstein namens Seuchenhüter des Nurgle.
foreignNames.flavor: Jeder Seuchenhüter wird aus der verdorbenen Seele eines Sterblichen geformt, der von der Fäulnis des Nurgle dahingerafft wurde.

foreignNames.name: Podredumbre de Nurgle
foreignNames.text:
Encantar criatura que controla un oponente.
Cuando la criatura encantada muera, regresa la Podredumbre de Nurgle a la mano de su propietario y tú creas una ficha de criatura Demonio negra 1/3 llamada Portador de Plaga de Nurgle.
foreignNames.flavor: Cada portador de plaga se forma a partir del alma corrompida de un mortal víctima de la Podredumbre de Nurgle.

foreignNames.name: Gangrène de Nurgle
foreignNames.text:
Enchanter : une créature qu'un adversaire contrôle
Quand la créature enchantée meurt, renvoyez la Gangrène de Nurgle dans la main de son propriétaire et vous créez un jeton de créature 1/3 noire Démon appelé Portepeste de Nurgle.
foreignNames.flavor: Chaque portepeste est constitué de l'âme corrompue d'un mortel tué par la Gangrène de Nurgle.

foreignNames.name: Putrefazione di Nurgle
foreignNames.text:
Incanta creatura controllata da un avversario
Quando la creatura incantata muore, fai tornare la Putrefazione di Nurgle in mano al suo proprietario e crei una pedina creatura Demone 1/3 nera chiamata Untori di Nurgle.
foreignNames.flavor: Ogni untore viene formato dall'anima corrotta di un mortale ucciso dalla putrefazione di Nurgle.

foreignNames.name: ナーグルの腐蝕
foreignNames.text:
エンチャント（対戦相手がコントロールしているクリーチャー）
エンチャントしているクリーチャーが死亡したとき、ナーグルの腐蝕をオーナーの手札に戻し、あなたは「プレーグベアラー・オヴ・ナーグル」という名前の黒の１/３のデーモン・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。
foreignNames.type: エンチャント — オーラ
foreignNames.flavor: プレーグベアラー一体一体が、ナーグルの腐蝕によって殺された定命の者の荒廃した魂によって形成される。

foreignNames.name: Podridão de Nurgle
foreignNames.text:
Encantar criatura que um oponente controla
Quando a criatura encantada morrer, devolva Podridão de Nurgle para a mão de seu dono e você cria uma ficha de criatura Demônio preta 1/3 com o nome Porta-peste de Nurgle.
foreignNames.flavor: Cada porta-peste é formado pela alma pestilenta de um mortal vítima da Podridão de Nurgle.

foreignNames.name: 纳垢之腐
foreignNames.text:
结附于由对手操控的生物
当所结附的生物死去时，将纳垢之腐移回其拥有者手上，且你派出一个1/3黑色，名称为纳垢瘟疫行者的恶魔衍生生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 每个瘟疫行者，都来自因纳垢之腐而丧命的凡人枯萎灵魂。

originalText:
Enchant creature an opponent controls
When enchanted creature dies, return Nurgle's Rot to its owner's hand and you create a 1/3 black Demon creature token named Plaguebearer of Nurgle.

name: Nurgle's Rot
text:
Enchant creature an opponent controls
When enchanted creature dies, return Nurgle's Rot to its owner's hand and you create a 1/3 black Demon creature token named Plaguebearer of Nurgle.
flavor: Each plaguebearer is formed from the blighted soul of a mortal slain by Nurgle's Rot.

name: Out of the Tombs
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put two eon counters on Out of the Tombs, then mill cards equal to the number of eon counters on it.
If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, instead return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If you can't, you lose the game.

rulings.text: If an effect instructs a player to draw multiple cards, each of those cards are drawn independently, and Out of the Tombs’s second ability will apply to each one if appropriate.

foreignNames.name: Aus der Gruft
foreignNames.text:
Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments legst du zwei Äonenmarken auf Aus der Gruft und millst dann so viele Karten, wie Äonenmarken darauf liegen.
Falls du eine Karte ziehen würdest, während deine Bibliothek keine Karten enthält, bringe stattdessen eine Kreaturenkarte aus deinem Friedhof ins Spiel zurück. Falls du das nicht kannst, verlierst du die Partie.

foreignNames.name: Surgir de las Necrópolis
foreignNames.text:
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, pon dos contadores de eones sobre Surgir de las Necrópolis y luego muele una cantidad de cartas igual a la cantidad de contadores de eones sobre este permanente.
Si fueras a robar una carta mientras tu biblioteca no tiene cartas, en vez de eso, regresa una carta de criatura de tu cementerio al campo de batalla. Si no puedes, pierdes el juego.

foreignNames.name: Sortie des nécropoles
foreignNames.text:
Au début de votre entretien, mettez deux marqueurs « éon » sur la Sortie des nécropoles, puis meulez un nombre de cartes égal au nombre de marqueurs « éon » sur elle.
Si vous deviez piocher une carte pendant que votre bibliothèque ne contient aucune carte, à la place renvoyez sur le champ de bataille une carte de créature depuis votre cimetière. Si vous ne pouvez pas le faire, vous perdez la partie.

foreignNames.name: Fuori dalle Tombe
foreignNames.text:
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, metti due segnalini eternità su Fuori dalle Tombe, poi macina carte pari al numero di segnalini eternità su di esso.
Se stai per pescare una carta mentre il tuo grimorio è vuoto, rimetti invece sul campo di battaglia una carta creatura dal tuo cimitero. Se non puoi farlo, perdi la partita.

foreignNames.name: 墳墓からの脱出
foreignNames.text:
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、墳墓からの脱出の上に永劫カウンター２個を置き、その後、これの上にある永劫カウンターの個数に等しい枚数のカードを切削する。
あなたがあなたのライブラリーにカードがない状態でカードを引くなら、代わりにあなたの墓地にあるクリーチャー・カード１枚を戦場に戻す。そうできないなら、あなたはこのゲームに敗北する。

foreignNames.name: Sair das Tumbas
foreignNames.text:
No início de sua manutenção, coloque dois marcadores de era em Sair das Tumbas, depois triture uma quantidade de cards igual ao número de marcadores de era nele.
Se você compraria um card de seu grimório vazio, em vez disso, devolva um card de criatura de seu cemitério para o campo de batalha. Se não puder fazer isso, você perderá o jogo.

foreignNames.name: 古墓苏生
foreignNames.text:
在你的维持开始时，在古墓苏生上放置两个亘古指示物，然后磨若干牌，其数量等同于其上的亘古指示物数量。
如果你将抓一张牌但牌库没有牌，则改为将一张生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。若你无法如此作，则你输掉这盘游戏。

originalText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put two eon counters on Out of the Tombs, then mill cards equal to the number of eon counters on it.
If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, instead return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If you can't, you lose the game.

name: Out of the Tombs
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put two eon counters on Out of the Tombs, then mill cards equal to the number of eon counters on it.
If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, instead return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If you can't, you lose the game.

rulings.text: If an effect instructs a player to draw multiple cards, each of those cards are drawn independently, and Out of the Tombs’s second ability will apply to each one if appropriate.

name: Plague Drone
text:
Flying
Rot Fly — If an opponent would gain life, that player loses that much life instead.
flavor: High-ranking plaguebearers of Nurgle's realm ride into realspace mounted upon Rot Flies—colossal daemonic insects whose appearance is so repugnant it scars the mind.

rulings.text: If more than one replacement effect tries to apply to a life gain event, the player who would gain life chooses the order in which they apply. For example, if a player who controls Alhammarret’s Archive would gain 3 life while Plague Drone is on the battlefield, that player may choose to have the 3 life become doubled to 6 life and then lose 6 life. The player may also choose to apply Plague Drone first, turning “gain 3 life” into “lose 3 life.” Alhammarret’s Archive would then not apply.
Having more than one Plague Drone on the battlefield doesn’t have any noticeable effect on life gain. Once the effect of one Plague Drone applies, there is no life gain for the others to apply to.

foreignNames.name: Seuchendrohne
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Fäulnisfliege — Falls ein Gegner Lebenspunkte dazuerhalten würde, verliert er stattdessen entsprechend viele Lebenspunkte.
foreignNames.flavor: Hochrangige Seuchenhüter aus dem Reich von Nurgle reiten auf Fäulnisfliegen in den Realraum — kolossalen dämonischen Insekten, deren Aussehen so abstoßend ist, dass man bei ihrem Anblick den Verstand verliert.

foreignNames.name: Plague Drone
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Mosca de putrefacción — Si un oponente fuera a ganar vidas, en vez de eso, ese jugador pierde esa misma cantidad de vidas.
foreignNames.flavor: Los portadores de plaga de alto rango del reino de Nurgle se adentran en el espacio real sobre Moscas de putrefacción, colosales insectos daemónicos con una apariencia tan repugnante que horroriza a quien llega a verlos.

foreignNames.name: Plague Drone
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Mouche à peste — Si un adversaire devait gagner des points de vie, ce joueur perd autant de points de vie à la place.
foreignNames.flavor: Les portepestes de haut rang du royaume de Nurgle chargent dans l'espace réel montés sur des mouches à peste, des insectes démoniaques colossaux dont l'apparence est si répugnante qu'elle endommage l'esprit.

foreignNames.name: Plague Drone
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Mosca della Peste — Se un avversario sta per guadagnare punti vita, quel giocatore perde invece altrettanti punti vita.
foreignNames.flavor: Gli untori di alto rango del regno di Nurgle cavalcano nello spazio in sella alle mosche della peste, giganteschi insetti demoniaci il cui aspetto è così ripugnante da sfigurare la mente.

foreignNames.name: プレーグ・ドローン
foreignNames.text:
飛行,
ロット・フライ — 対戦相手１人がライフを得るなら、代わりにそのプレイヤーはその点数に等しいライフを失う。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — デーモン
foreignNames.flavor: ナーグルの領域の高位のプレーグベアラーは、心に傷を負うほど醜い巨大ディーモン蟲、ロット・フライに乗って物質界に乗り込む。

foreignNames.name: Plague Drone
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Mosca da Podridão — Se um oponente ganharia pontos de vida, em vez disso, aquele jogador perde aquela quantidade de pontos de vida.
foreignNames.flavor: Os porta-pestes de alto escalão do reino de Nurgle entram no espaço real montados em Moscas da Podridão, gigantescos insetos daemoníacos tão repugnantes que chegam a causar traumas mentais.

foreignNames.name: 瘟疫蜂兵
foreignNames.text:
飞行
腐蝇～如果某对手将获得生命，则改为该牌手失去等量的生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 纳垢领域的高阶瘟疫行者会骑着腐蝇闯入实体宇宙～这种庞巨魔虫外貌极丑，甚至能给心灵留下创伤。

originalText:
Flying
Rot Fly — If an opponent would gain life, that player loses that much life instead.

flavor: High-ranking plaguebearers of Nurgle's realm ride into realspace mounted upon Rot Flies—colossal daemonic insects whose appearance is so repugnant it scars the mind.

name: Plasmancer
text:
Flying
Dynastic Advisor — When Plasmancer enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: Masters of dimensional dissonance, singularity manipulation, and countless other technologies, plasmancers are terrifying to behold.

foreignNames.name: Plasmant
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Dynastie-Berater — Wenn der Plasmant ins Spiel kommt, durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Sumpf-Standardlandkarte, zeige sie offen vor, nimm sie auf deine Hand und mische danach.
foreignNames.flavor: Als Meister der Dimensionsdissonanz, der Singularitätsmanipulation und zahlloser anderer Technologien sind Plasmanten ein furchterregender Anblick.

foreignNames.name: Plasmante
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Consejero dinástico — Cuando el Plasmante entre al campo de batalla, busca en tu biblioteca una carta de Pantano básica, muéstrala, ponla en tu mano y luego baraja.
foreignNames.flavor: Los plasmantes, maestros de la disonancia dimensional, la manipulación de la singularidad e innumerables otras tecnologías, resultan siempre un oponente aterrador.

foreignNames.name: Plasmancien
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Conseiller dynastique — Quand le Plasmancien arrive sur le champ de bataille, cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de marais de base, révélez-la, mettez-la dans votre main, puis mélangez.
foreignNames.flavor: Maîtres de la dissonance dimensionnelle, de la manipulation des singularités cosmiques et de bien d'autres technologies, les plasmanciens défient la raison.

foreignNames.name: Plasmomante
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Consigliere Dinastico — Quando il Plasmomante entra nel campo di battaglia, passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta Palude base, rivelala e aggiungila alla tua mano, poi rimescola.
foreignNames.flavor: Esperti di dissonanza dimensionale, manipolazione della singolarità e innumerevoli altre tecnologie, i plasmomanti sono una visione terrificante.

foreignNames.name: プラズマンサー
foreignNames.text:
飛行
王朝の助言者 — プラズマンサーが戦場に出たとき、あなたのライブラリーから基本沼・カード１枚を探し、公開し、あなたの手札に加える。その後、ライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignNames.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — ネクロン・ウィザード
foreignNames.flavor: 次元の不調和やシンギュラリティの操作、その他無数の技術に精通するプラズマンサーは見た目も脅威的である。

foreignNames.name: Plasmante
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Conselheiro Dinástico — Quando Plasmante entrar no campo de batalha, procure em seu grimório um card de Pântano básico, revele-o, coloque-o em sua mão e depois embaralhe.
foreignNames.flavor: Mestres da dissonância espacial, da manipulação de singularidades e de outras incontáveis tecnologias, os plasmantes são uma visão aterrorizante.

foreignNames.name: 能量巫师
foreignNames.text:
飞行
王朝参谋～当能量巫师进战场时，从你牌库中搜寻一张基本的沼泽牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。
foreignNames.type: 神器生物 ～太空死灵／法术师
foreignNames.flavor: 能量巫师精通维度失谐、奇点摆弄及其他无数科技，每次出现都让人不寒而栗。

originalText:
Flying
Dynastic Advisor — When Plasmancer enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Plasmancer
text:
Flying
Dynastic Advisor — When Plasmancer enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: Masters of dimensional dissonance, singularity manipulation, and countless other technologies, plasmancers are terrifying to behold.

name: Poxwalkers
text:
Deathtouch
Curse of the Walking Pox — Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, return Poxwalkers from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
flavor: Poxwalkers are victims of the Walking Pox, a cruel virulence which rots the infected to death while keeping them conscious.

foreignNames.name: Seuchenwandler
foreignNames.text:
Todesberührung
Fluch der Wanderpocken — Immer wenn du einen Zauberspruch von irgendwoher außer deiner Hand wirkst, bringe die Seuchenwandler aus deinem Friedhof getappt ins Spiel zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: Seuchenwandler sind Opfer der wandelnden Pocken, einer grausamen Seuche, die die Infizierten zu Tode verwest, sie aber bei Bewusstsein hält.

foreignNames.name: Plagabundos
foreignNames.text:
Toque mortal.
Maldición de la Viruela Caminante — Siempre que lances un hechizo desde cualquier parte excepto desde tu mano, regresa a los Plagabundos desde tu cementerio al campo de batalla girados.
foreignNames.flavor: Los Plagabundos son víctimas de la Viruela Caminante, una cruel afección que hace que los infectados, conscientes en todo momento, se pudran hasta morir.

foreignNames.name: Scrofuleux
foreignNames.text:
Contact mortel
Malédiction de la vérole ambulante — À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort depuis autre part que votre main, renvoyez les Scrofuleux sur le champ de bataille, engagés, depuis votre cimetière.
foreignNames.flavor: Les scrofuleux sont les victimes de la vérole ambulante, une virulence cruelle qui décompose les infectés à mort tout en les maintenant conscients.

foreignNames.name: Pestevaganti
foreignNames.text:
Tocco letale
Afflizione della Peste Vagante — Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia da una zona diversa dalla tua mano, rimetti sul campo di battaglia TAPpati i Pestevaganti dal tuo cimitero.
foreignNames.flavor: I pestevaganti sono vittime della peste vagante, un virus crudele che fa marcire gli infetti fino alla morte mantenendoli coscienti.

foreignNames.name: ポクスウォーカー
foreignNames.text:
接死
歩き膿疱の呪い — あなたがあなたの手札以外から呪文を唱えるたび、あなたの墓地にあるポクスウォーカーをタップ状態で戦場に戻す。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ゾンビ
foreignNames.flavor: ポクスウォーカーは、感染者の意識を残したまま腐敗させ死に至らしめる残酷な病原菌歩き膿疱の被害者である。

foreignNames.name: Pustâmbulos
foreignNames.text:
Toque mortífero
Maldição da Pústula Ambulante — Toda vez que você conjurar uma mágica de qualquer lugar além de sua mão, devolva Pustâmbulos de seu cemitério para o campo de batalha virado.
foreignNames.flavor: Os pustâmbulos são vítimas da Pústula Ambulante, uma doença cruel que faz com que os infectados apodreçam até morrer, mas conscientes.

foreignNames.name: 瘟疫行尸
foreignNames.text:
死触
致疫诅咒～每当你从你手牌以外的任何区域施放咒语时，将瘟疫行尸从你的坟墓场横置移回战场。
foreignNames.flavor: 行尸瘟疫这种残忍病毒会令感染者在神智清醒的情况下眼睁睁地看着自己的躯体逐渐腐烂，直至死亡；而病殁者便转化为瘟疫行尸。

name: Primaris Eliminator
text:
When Primaris Eliminator enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Executioner Round — Destroy target creature.
• Hyperfrag Round — Creatures target player controls get -2/-2 until end of turn.

foreignNames.name: Primaris-Eliminator
foreignNames.text:
Wenn der Primaris-Eliminator ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eines —
• Executor-Geschoss — Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl.
• Hyper-Schrapnellgeschoss — Kreaturen, die ein Spieler deiner Wahl kontrolliert, erhalten -2/-2 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignNames.name: Eliminador Primaris
foreignNames.text:
Cuando el Eliminador Primaris entre al campo de batalla, elige uno:
• Balas ejecutor — Destruye la criatura objetivo.
• Balas hiperfrag — Las criaturas que controla el jugador objetivo obtienen -2/-2 hasta el final del turno.

foreignNames.name: Eliminator Primaris
foreignNames.text:
Quand l'Eliminator Primaris arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez l'un —
• Balle Executioner — Détruisez une créature ciblée.
• Balle Hyperfrag — Les créatures qu'un joueur ciblé contrôle gagnent -2/-2 jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignNames.name: Eliminatore Primaris
foreignNames.text:
Quando l'Eliminatore Primaris entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli uno —
• Proiettile Executioner — Distruggi una creatura bersaglio.
• Proiettile a Iperframmentazione — Le creature controllate da un giocatore bersaglio prendono -2/-2 fino alla fine del turno.

foreignNames.name: プライマリス・エリミネイター
foreignNames.text:
プライマリス・エリミネイターが戦場に出たとき、以下から１つを選ぶ。
• エクスキューショナー弾 — クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それを破壊する。
• ハイパーフラグ弾 — プレイヤー１人を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、そのプレイヤーがコントロールしているすべてのクリーチャーは－２/－２の修整を受ける。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — アスタルテス・戦士

foreignNames.name: Eliminador Primaris
foreignNames.text:
Quando Eliminador Primaris entrar no campo de batalha, escolha um —
• Munição do Executor — Destrua a criatura alvo.
• Munição à Hiperfragmentação — As criaturas que o jogador alvo controla recebem -2/-2 até o final do turno.

foreignNames.name: 原铸歼灭者
foreignNames.text:
当原铸歼灭者进战场时，选择一项～
•处刑者爆矢弹～消灭目标生物。
•超破片弹～由目标牌手操控的生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。

originalText:

• Executioner Round — Destroy target creature.
• Hyperfrag Round — Creatures target player controls get -2/-2 until end of turn.

name: Primaris Eliminator
text:
When Primaris Eliminator enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Executioner Round — Destroy target creature.
• Hyperfrag Round — Creatures target player controls get -2/-2 until end of turn.

name: Psychomancer
text:
Flying
Harbinger of Despair — Whenever Psychomancer or another nontoken artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield or is put into exile from the battlefield, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

foreignNames.name: Psychomant
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Bote der Verzweiflung — Immer wenn der Psychomant oder ein anderes Nichtspielsteinartefakt, das du kontrollierst, aus dem Spiel auf einen Friedhof gelegt oder aus dem Spiel ins Exil geschickt wird, verliert ein Gegner deiner Wahl 1 Lebenspunkt und du erhältst 1 Lebenspunkt dazu.

foreignNames.name: Psicomante
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Heraldo de desesperación — Siempre que el Psicomante u otro artefacto que no sea ficha que controlas vaya a un cementerio desde el campo de batalla o vaya al exilio desde el campo de batalla, el oponente objetivo pierde 1 vida y tú ganas 1 vida.

foreignNames.name: Psychomancien
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Émissaire du désespoir — À chaque fois que le Psychomancien ou un autre artefact non-jeton que vous contrôlez est mis dans un cimetière depuis le champ de bataille ou en exil depuis le champ de bataille, un adversaire ciblé perd 1 point de vie et vous gagnez 1 point de vie.

foreignNames.name: Psicomante
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Araldo della Disperazione — Ogniqualvolta lo Psicomante o un altro artefatto non pedina che controlli viene messo in un cimitero dal campo di battaglia o viene messo in esilio dal campo di battaglia, un avversario bersaglio perde 1 punto vita e tu guadagni 1 punto vita.

foreignNames.name: サイコマンサー
foreignNames.text:
飛行
絶望の先触れ — サイコマンサーや、あなたがコントロールしていてトークンでもこれでもないアーティファクト１つが戦場から墓地や追放領域に置かれるたび、対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは１点のライフを失い、あなたは１点のライフを得る。
foreignNames.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — ネクロン・ウィザード

foreignNames.name: Psicomante
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Anunciador do Desespero — Toda vez que Psicomante ou outro artefato não ficha que você controla é colocado do campo de batalha em um cemitério ou no exílio, o oponente alvo perde 1 ponto de vida e você ganha 1 ponto de vida.

foreignNames.name: 精神巫师
foreignNames.text:
飞行
绝望先兆～每当精神巫师或另一个由你操控且非衍生物的神器从战场进入坟墓场或放逐区时，目标对手失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。
foreignNames.type: 神器生物 ～太空死灵／法术师

name: Royal Warden
text:
Phalanx Commander — When Royal Warden enters the battlefield, create two tapped 2/2 black Necron Warrior artifact creature tokens.
Unearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

rulings.text: If you activate a card’s unearth ability but that card is removed from your graveyard before the ability resolves, that unearth ability will resolve and do nothing.

Activating a permanent card's unearth ability isn’t the same as casting it as a spell. The unearth ability is put on the stack, but the card is not. Spells and abilities that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle) will interact with unearth, but spells and abilities that interact with spells (such as Cancel) will not.

If a permanent returned to the battlefield by an unearth ability would leave it for any reason, it’s exiled instead—unless the spell or ability that's causing it to leave the battlefield is actually trying to exile it. In that case, the spell or ability succeeds at exiling the permanent. If the spell or ability later returns the card to the battlefield, it will return as a new object with no relation to its previous existence. The unearth effect will no longer apply to it.

At the beginning of the end step, a permanent returned to the battlefield with unearth is exiled. This is a delayed triggered ability, and it can be countered by effects that counter triggered abilities. If the ability is countered, the permanent will stay on the battlefield and the delayed trigger won’t trigger again. However, the replacement effect will still exile it if it eventually leaves the battlefield.

Unearth grants haste to the permanent that’s returned to the battlefield. However, neither of the “exile” abilities is granted to that permanent. If that creature loses all its abilities, it will still be exiled at the beginning of the end step, and if it would leave the battlefield, it is still exiled instead.

foreignNames.name: Königswächter
foreignNames.text:
Phalanx-Commander — Wenn der Königswächter ins Spiel kommt, erzeuge zwei getappte 2/2 schwarze Necron-Krieger-Artefaktkreaturenspielsteine.
Exhumieren {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Bringe diese Karte aus deinem Friedhof ins Spiel zurück. Sie erhält Eile. Schicke sie zu Beginn des nächsten Endsegments, oder falls sie das Spiel verlassen würde, ins Exil. Spiele Exhumieren wie eine Hexerei.)

foreignNames.name: Guardia Real
foreignNames.text:
Comandante de falange — Cuando el Guardia Real entre al campo de batalla, crea dos fichas de criatura artefacto Guerrero Necrón negras 2/2 giradas.
Desenterrar {3}{B}. ({3}{B}: Regresa esta carta de tu cementerio al campo de batalla. Gana la habilidad de prisa. Exíliala al comienzo del próximo paso final o si fuera a dejar el campo de batalla. Activa la habilidad de desenterrar solo como un conjuro.)

foreignNames.name: Garde royal
foreignNames.text:
Commandant de phalanges — Quand le Garde royal arrive sur le champ de bataille, créez deux jetons de créature-artefact 2/2 noire Nécron et Guerrier engagés.
Exhumation {3}{B} ({3}{B} : Renvoyez cette carte sur le champ de bataille depuis votre cimetière. Elle acquiert la célérité. Exilez-la au début de la prochaine étape de fin ou si elle devait quitter le champ de bataille. N'exhumez que lorsque vous pourriez lancer un rituel.)

foreignNames.name: Guardiano Reale
foreignNames.text:
Comandante della Falange — Quando il Guardiano Reale entra nel campo di battaglia, crea due pedine creatura artefatto Guerriero Necron 2/2 nere TAPpate.
Dissotterrare {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Rimetti sul campo di battaglia questa carta dal tuo cimitero. Ha rapidità. Esiliala all'inizio della prossima sottofase finale o se sta per lasciare il campo di battaglia. Dissotterra solo come una stregoneria.)

foreignNames.name: ロイヤルワーデン
foreignNames.text:
ファランクス・コマンダー — ロイヤルワーデンが戦場に出たとき、黒の２/２のネクロン・戦士・アーティファクト・クリーチャー・トークン２体をタップ状態で生成する。
蘇生{3}{B}（{3}{B}：あなたの墓地にあるこのカードを戦場に戻す。これは速攻を得る。次の終了ステップの開始時に、またはこれが戦場を離れるなら、これを追放する。蘇生はソーサリーとしてのみ行う。）
foreignNames.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — ネクロン

foreignNames.name: Protetor Real
foreignNames.text:
Comandante de Falange — Quando Protetor Real entrar no campo de batalha, crie duas fichas de criatura artefato Necron Guerreiro preta 2/2 viradas.
Desenterrar {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Devolva este card de seu cemitério para o campo de batalha. Ele ganha ímpeto. Exile-o no início da próxima etapa final ou se ele for deixar o campo de batalha. Use desenterrar somente como um feitiço.)

foreignNames.name: 皇家主管
foreignNames.text:
山阵指挥官～当皇家主管进战场时，派出两个已横置的2/2黑色太空死灵／战士衍生神器生物。
破坟{3}{B}（{3}{B}：将此牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。它获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，或若它将离开战场，将它放逐。只能于法术时机破坟。）

Phalanx Commander — When Royal Warden enters the battlefield, create two tapped 2/2 black Necron Warrior artifact creature tokens.

name: Royal Warden
text:
Phalanx Commander — When Royal Warden enters the battlefield, create two tapped 2/2 black Necron Warrior artifact creature tokens.
Unearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

rulings.text: If you activate a card’s unearth ability but that card is removed from your graveyard before the ability resolves, that unearth ability will resolve and do nothing.

Activating a permanent card's unearth ability isn’t the same as casting it as a spell. The unearth ability is put on the stack, but the card is not. Spells and abilities that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle) will interact with unearth, but spells and abilities that interact with spells (such as Cancel) will not.

If a permanent returned to the battlefield by an unearth ability would leave it for any reason, it’s exiled instead—unless the spell or ability that's causing it to leave the battlefield is actually trying to exile it. In that case, the spell or ability succeeds at exiling the permanent. If the spell or ability later returns the card to the battlefield, it will return as a new object with no relation to its previous existence. The unearth effect will no longer apply to it.

At the beginning of the end step, a permanent returned to the battlefield with unearth is exiled. This is a delayed triggered ability, and it can be countered by effects that counter triggered abilities. If the ability is countered, the permanent will stay on the battlefield and the delayed trigger won’t trigger again. However, the replacement effect will still exile it if it eventually leaves the battlefield.

Unearth grants haste to the permanent that’s returned to the battlefield. However, neither of the “exile” abilities is granted to that permanent. If that creature loses all its abilities, it will still be exiled at the beginning of the end step, and if it would leave the battlefield, it is still exiled instead.

name: Skorpekh Lord

Menace
Command Protocols — Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+0 and have menace.
